topics.body:
"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5312b5aa636872047b4f0000#post_5312b5aa636872047b4f0000
What really gets me is the "freedom and heroism" jive that gets shoved down people's throats, mostly because that was what got me in the Army, because teenage me was a goddamn idiot.*

When the TSA is cupping your crotch ask yourself how free you really feel, and there is nothing heroic about getting blown up by a roadside bomb or shooting some poor dumb bastard who got fed a similar line of shit, just with Allah instead of Jesus.

I'm not arguing for pacifism, acting in self defense or in retaliation for atrocities like 9/11 is justified but looking for fights and the long term occupations is ultimately bad for everyone, a senseless waste of life.

*To be fair, I'm still an idiot. Just in different ways.

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/5312b7c46368720732e10000#post_5312b7c46368720732e10000
I missed the Putin bashing?! Dammit! Is it too late to get in on it? Because I bet Putin has a needle dick.

Seriously, he goes out of his way to put out an uber macho image that too me speaks of deep, deep insecurity.

!http://i.dailymail.co.uk/i/pix/2013/12/12/article-2522767-1A10256500000578-425_634x765.jpg!

The problem with valkryie though is that it's slow and realistically speaking right now would only have a use in space right now.  Considering ten years ago our most humanoid robot was asimo that's a long way we've come.  Imagine where we'll be technologically in ten years.
